ygData.subject: Grand Battle
ygData.msgSnippet: (I don t think the tunnel that were fighting is wide enough to do all the stuff you were doing, but I ll go with it. Oh, and Alloran, if you really want Eagle

(I don't think the tunnel that were fighting is wide enough to do all 
the stuff you were doing, but I'll go with it. Oh, and Alloran, if 
you really want Eagle Eye to die, I've got a really cool death scene 
planned but I need to have control of him. Is it okay?)

Vulois

Vulois felt the schorching heat of the ring. What an evil this being 
is! For centuries he must have been studying the Black Arts, and I 
thought I could beat him with a few months?!? Who am I joking. It 
will all die here now. I'll die. Child will die. Eagle Eye just 
arrived; he'll die. Nemesis will assume there are more in the main 
cave and will kill Windrazor Terradive and Afterburner. That will 
only leave Battera and Cybershark. Battera is faithful, but a tad 
nieve and scared about responsibility. I felt that Cybershark had 
been doing some fighting, some strange enemy that would have had to 
do with something in the future for me. No one left. All over.....

Suddenly Vulois felt the burst of energy. He turned around to see 
Child mumble something, and collapse. Than Vulois realized it: Child 
had given him his power. One shot to defeat the greatest evil in the 
world. Vulois stod up, and brushed the flame away with a wiff of his 
hand and gazed at Nemesis. No more evil. Nothing left to lose. All 
out power.

"Time for you to burn..."

(Shomin, don't respond yet. I need Allorans okay and than I need to 
finish my post.)
